items.name: siesta_getting_started
items.title: Getting Started with Siesta - stress free JavaScript unit testing
items.description: This guide will allow you to get started with Siesta.

items.name: siesta_automation
items.title: Siesta automation. Continuous integration
items.description: This guide describes how test suite for Siesta can be launched from command line.

items.name: testing_mvc_app
items.title: Testing ExtJS MVC application with Siesta
items.description: This guide contains details about how to make testing MVC application easier.

items.name: extending_test_class
items.title: Extending test class with your own assertions and utility methods
items.description: This guide describes, how to add your own assertions and/or utility methods to the test class.

items.name: cross_page_testing
items.title: Cross page testing
items.description: This guide describes, how to write cross-page tests (tests involving page refresh / redirect)
